body_html:
But there may be some potential performance overhead between the switch of TensorRT of TF(around several hundred us to 1ms observed in our scenarios)

@yangjunpro We are interested in integrating TensorRT with TensorFlow. May I know all the elapsed time of your scenarios, or how much percentage of switch overhead in whole elapsed time? Thanks very much!

body:
> But there may be some potential performance overhead between the switch of TensorRT of TF(around several hundred us to 1ms observed in our scenarios)

@yangjunpro We are interested in integrating TensorRT with TensorFlow. May I know all the elapsed time of your scenarios, or how much percentage of switch overhead in whole elapsed time? Thanks very much!
